function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Minimal consideration and evaluation of BACS design and operation","Impact":"Ineffective and suboptimal building performance","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough evaluation and testing of BACS design and operation with adequate resources and level of detail","Technologies":"Building automation and control systems (BACS)","People":"Building owners, facility managers, and occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and automation engineers"}]}
